subject: Order
description_text:
Hello,

I recently ordered the Simsonn Plus X peddles and paid the extra £20 to receive the package with in 3 - 7 days. I ordered is on Friday the 3rd of October and have not heard back, the only thing I got was the confirmation email. If you need any more information, please email me back. Please let me know. Thank you

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4990 中
